entry.title: New release for Read You: 0.12.0
entry.content:
Known issues

  1. App could crash on devices under Android 14, to workaround this issue, please go to Settings - Color & style - Reading page and set the Content renderer to WebView

Notable changes

  1. Improve the stability and performance of feed syncing
  2. Support specifying a client certificate for mTLS auth
  3. Add a feed-level option to open the article in browsers by default
  4. Navigating from/to article reader won't clear the articles marked as read from the list now
  5. Improve handling of edge cases when using bionic reading
  6. Add an option to sort unread articles by lastest/earliest

entry.title: New release for Read You: 0.12.1
entry.content:
Fixes for 0.12.0

  • App crashes on devices under Android 15 when using native component renderer
  • App could not mark articles as read after being cleared from recent apps

Notable changes since 0.11

  1. Improve the stability and performance of feed syncing
  2. Support specifying a client certificate for mTLS auth
  3. Add a feed-level option to open the article in browsers by default
  4. Navigating from/to article reader won't clear the articles marked as read from the list now
  5. Improve handling of edge cases when using bionic reading
  6. Add an option to sort unread articles by lastest/earliest

entry.title: New release for Read You: 0.12.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  1. Mark above/below as read no longer clears articles from the unread view.
  2. Fix the issue where Mark above/below as read not working as expected when sorting unread items by earliest
  3. Fix the issue where articles not being marked as read when navigating back to the home page
  4. Subtle motion & style tweaks

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Ashinch/ReadYou/compare/0.12.1...0.12.2

entry.title: New release for Read You: 0.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features

  1. Pull up to load next feed/group in the article list
  2. Pull up to mark all items in the list as read
  3. Display longer (up to 4 lines) summaries in article list
  4. Scroll down to the article you've just read
  5. Full webpage content for "Parse Full Content" feeds now will be downloaded & cached during sync

Notable Changes

  1. Remove pull to sync in article list temporarily since there's no feed/group level syncing yet
  2. Fine-tuned content transitions and gesture interactions

Fixes

  1. Fix an issue which cause reading page to freeze while syncing
  2. Fix an issue where home page could show delayed unread counts or feeds
  3. Fix an issue where text cannot be de-select when using native renderer

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Ashinch/ReadYou/compare/0.12.2...0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Read You: 0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  1. "Pull up to mark all as read" in article list should be only enabled via "Mark as read on scroll"
  2. Fix an issue where the search bar is closed on scroll
  3. Fix an issue where articles are synced with the current time instead of their published time (#886)
  4. Fix an issue that causes previously cleared articles to be re-synced (#294 #696 #943)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Ashinch/ReadYou/compare/0.13.0...0.13.1
